name: Super Vet
description: What is the project about? Super Vet — the first-ever AI-integrated animal-rescue RPG Game that redefines gaming with its fusion of GameFi, AI, Metaverse, Cinematic, and Comics series. Going beyond digital boundaries, Super Vet introduces the AI Paw Tracker powered by Artificial Intelligence. Furthermore, Super Vet is taking gameplay to new heights by introducing AI Companions along with the addition of Metaverse in the fourth tier named Superverse. What makes your project unique? With Super Vet, explore the vastness of Superverse, an expansive Metaverse realm offering advanced features, and unlocking the power of AI technology. Additionally, equip yourself with the AI Paw Tracker aimed at improving the quality of life of animals by providing a solution to the challenges faced by pet owners and farmers beyond the digital realm. History of your project. What’s next for your project? What can your token be used for? Our ecosystem is powered by the $SVET token, serving as the native currency that facilitates seamless transactions across AI, Metaverse, Cinematic, Comic, and Game elements.
